solution_line_template: Anna needs {slices_per_sandwich} x {num_sandwiches} = <<{slices_per_sandwich}*{num_sandwiches}={total_slices_needed}>>{total_slices_needed} slices of ham to make {num_sandwiches} sandwiches.
Anna needs {total_slices_needed} - {slices_on_hand} = <<{total_slices_needed}-{slices_on_hand}={additional_slices_needed}>>{additional_slices_needed} more slices of ham
